name: Eggnite
description:
Eggnite

Steal the dragon's eggs and defeat it in a game of dodgeball. Play by yourself or with a friend!

Eggnite was made during LiU Fall Game Jam 2021.

Controls:
  • Mobile: Touch to control on either half of the screen
  • Keyboard left: WASD to move, F to shoot
  • Keyboard right: Arrowkeys to move, L to shoot

Team
  • Golen (code)
  • Raven (art)
  • Kaddkaka (code)
